thread.section_title: The Hollywood Reporter - Behind the Screen
thread.title: 'Suicide Squad' Team Wins Their First Makeup and Hair Styling Oscar
thread.title_full: 'Suicide Squad' Team Wins Their First Makeup and Hair Styling Oscar

title: 'Suicide Squad' Team Wins Their First Makeup and Hair Styling Oscar
text:
6:06pm   'Suicide Squad' Team Wins Makeup and Hair Styling Oscar Photofest The award went to Alessandro Bertolazzi, Giorgio Gregorini and Christopher Nelson. 
Warner Bros.' Suicide Squad won the Oscar for makeup and hair styling. 
It was the first Academy Award for Alessandro Bertolazzi, Giorgio Gregorini and Christopher Nelson. 
Suicide Squad topped a field that included Star Trek Beyond ( Star Trek won this category, then best achievement in makeup, in 2010) and Swedenâ€™s foreign-language contender A Man Called Ove.
